description technical detail:
NEC MultiSync PA272W-Bk - 27" - LED-backlit LCD Monitor
The 27" MultiSync PA272W (white) is the benchmark desktop display for color accurate applications. The innovative GB-R LED backlight provides 99.3% coverage of the Adobe RGB color space while consuming up to 37% less power than comparable CCFL backlights.
